com.intersystems.iknow.languagemodel.slavic.impl

Class LanguageToolAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intersystems.iknow.languagemodel.slavic.impl.LanguageToolAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MorphologicalAnalyzer, Remote

    public final class LanguageToolAnalyzer
extends Object
implements MorphologicalAnalyzer
    Morphological analyzer which uses the LanguageTool engine.
    Author:
    Andrey Shcheglov (mailto:andrey.shcheglov@intersystems.com)

    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        public Map<String,Set<MorphologicalAnalysisResult>> analyze(String text)
        Description copied from interface: MorphologicalAnalyzer
        Returns a map of tokens (i. e words) and (possibly, multiple) analyzes corresponding to each token. If a particular token can't be found in the dictionary, an empty set will be mapped to this token.
        Specified by:
        analyze in interface MorphologicalAnalyzer
        Parameters:
        text - a single word or a word sequence (i. e. a sentence)
        Returns:
        a map of tokens and analyzes corresponding to each token.
        See Also:
        MorphologicalAnalyzer.analyze(String)
